attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: My phone was fine and all of a sudden it started glitching right after I got this app!!! I’ve received  like 50 notifications in the last 2 minutes and the app itself is just poorly constructed .  If I could give it a lower rating I would. Don’t waste your time.

attributes.title: i had to buy a new phone because of the app
attributes.review: i got the app and it took all my storage and took all my information and the fBI came to my house on the second day i had it played this sort of music and my phone exploded and i had to get a new one the app kidnapped my pet cucumbers worst app ever

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: I got this app to see my orange Cheeto❤️, and ever since I got it my pet monkey😼won’t stop breathing,👁👄👁I simply don’t know what to do, she just won’t die, BYÜIEŠ✨ALSO my phone won’t stop crying since I got this app, I’m not sure why🤚🏼anyways my car was in the driveway and it just all of a sudden farted,😹I think I fed it to much beans last night.🧚🏼‍♀️💩dEbBy RyAn😏😏😏

attributes.title: DELETE THIS APP ASAP
attributes.review: This is the WORST app I have ever used because it destroyed my phone. Ever since I downloaded it, all my other apps keep crashing. Not to mention the app itself is always glitching and restarting my phone! Please save yourself the time and stress and delete this app from your phone. Thank me later!

attributes.title: My phone is on fire
attributes.review: I opened the app and my phone immediately grew eight legs and started running around my house. It killed my fish, cat, and elderly grandfather. All the while screaming “MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!” After it destroyed my entire house, the app spider caught on fire and left nothing but my phone case. The app is also very glitchy and slow.

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: first off the look horribly unappealing and doesn’t go with my home screen second i opened it and saw a crust chetto with a hair piece and i do not think that appropriate for people of any age and the fact that it’s in direct support of a person who is a pedo nast as a person who is under age I feel uncomfortable PLEASE DELETE THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible
attributes.review: While I was using the app they said I couldn’t use it because I was black and black people couldnt use it so I got mad and decided to go outside for a walk and it sent me a notification saying if I do go outside the police are gonna arrest me and I couldn’t do nothing about it so I started crying 🥺

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER DON’T GET IT!!!!!🖕🏽
attributes.review: The worst app ever it’s takes your money and can’t get a refund for the stuff you buy unbelievable the app knows where you live and it’s send the government to take you always from your family it’s just so bad it takes your time and money just unbelievable I’m sending this to the popo 🙄

attributes.title: The truth about the app 🤮
attributes.review: This app is figuring like how can the apple store even have it it’s just ewww , it’s so disturbing for younger kids , just disgusting I hope this app gets banned bc honestly it’s disgusting  🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮never try to downloads this bs it’s disgusting , this app will curse u the way it did sum of these trump supporters 😔, I hope no one falls for this apps lies .

attributes.title: THE WORST
attributes.review: this is the worst app ever. it turned off my phone completely. i also think it’s giving out false information, like since when could oranges labeled mango mussolini run for president?? i get the joke guys but the gig is over, it even stole my dogs toy, like who does that?? oh yeah, trump 2020 app will do that. never again!!!
